summary: Our 22nd annual assessment of DOD's weapon systems acquisition finds DOD still struggling to deliver new technologies quickly, even while faced with constantly evolving threats. DOD acknowledged it needed a new approach—creating acquisition pathways to speed up processes. But some programs in the new pathways likely won't deliver much faster than traditional programs. Also, DOD only reported plans to take full advantage of leading product...
title: Weapon Systems Annual Assessment: DOD Is Not Yet Well-Positioned to Field Systems with Speed
